block_comment: This block sets the value of "TxPointerLSB_rst" based on different conditions. It responds to the rising edge of the WB_CLK_I signal or the Reset. If Reset is active, "TxPointerLSB_rst" is set to 0. If "TxEn" and "TxEn_q" are enabled and "TxPointerRead" is set to true it takes the 2 LSBs from "ram_do". If "MasterWbTX" is active and acknowledgment from master is received "m_wb_ack_i", then the "TxPointerLSB_rst" is set to 0.
